Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class ChainedGameConversion

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.GameConversion
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.ChainedGameConversion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, Conversion<Game,​Game>
public class ChainedGameConversion
extends GameConversion
This class provides a chained conversion of game types or a sequence of conversions. If the sequence of game types is specified, then for any two consecutive types t1 and t2, there must be at least one conversion in GameConversionRepository from t1 to t2.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    Constructs this object to convert games based on a sequence of types with default options.
    ChainedGameConversion​(GameType[] types, Properties options)

  • Constructor Details

    • ChainedGameConversion

      public ChainedGameConversion​(GameType[] types)
      Constructs this object to convert games based on a sequence of types with default options.
      Parameters:
      types - a conversion sequence specified by game types, starting from the input game type and ending with the target game type
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion sequence contains less than 2 game types

    • ChainedGameConversion

      public ChainedGameConversion​(GameConversion[] conversions)
      Constructs this object to convert games based on a sequence of conversions with default options.
      Parameters:
      conversions - a sequence of conversions, starting from the first conversion and ending with the last conversion
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion sequence contains less than 2 game types

    • ChainedGameConversion

      public ChainedGameConversion​(GameType[] types, Properties options)
      Constructs this object to convert games based on a conversion sequence with custom options.
      Parameters:
      types - a conversion sequence, starting from the input game type and ending with the target game type
      options - custom options
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the conversion sequence contains less than 2 game types
